title: Scrolls
content: int. Scroll of Mage Armour Surround a creature in a protective magical force. Its Armour Class increases by 3.Prerequisite: not wearing armour. Scroll of Fire Bolt Hurl a mote of fire that deals 1d6 Fire and creates a flammable surface. Scroll of Inflict Wounds Infuse your hands with putreflying energy that deals 3d10 Necrotic.
